data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Veles that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Veles, North Macedonia

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Veles, North Macedonia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Veles, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 73 believers in Veles to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Albanian, Macedonian people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Over 38.03 percent of the people of Veles are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Veles. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.section_summary:
the state of Veles, North Macedonia has a population of 43,800.

We estimate Veles has 73 people who might know Jesus, 27,071 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 16,656 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 599 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Veles, North Macedonia that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.
